about_the_game:
False Ages I - Dark Lords of Hermad

🌟 Welcome to the Dark Fantasy World of False Ages I - Dark Lords of Hermad! 🌟

Dive into an enchanting 8-bit realm where darkness meets fantasy. False Ages offers an immersive adventure with mystical creatures, challenging quests, and a captivating storyline that will enthrall you.

🎮 Game Features:

* Classic 8-bit Graphics: Enjoy beautifully crafted 320 x 240 resolution visuals that evoke the nostalgia of retro gaming.
* Engaging Storyline: Embark on an epic journey filled with rich lore and dark fantasy elements.
* Turn-Based RPG: Experience strategic and tactical gameplay with turn-based combat.
* Challenging Gameplay: Test your skills with intricate levels, puzzles, and formidable enemies.
* Secrets & Easter Eggs: Uncover hidden secrets and easter eggs throughout the game.
* Immersive Soundtrack: Experience an atmospheric soundtrack that enhances the dark fantasy ambiance.

🔧 Developed with RPG Architect:
Proudly created using RPG Architect, False Ages - Dark Lords of Hermad combines classic game design with modern development tools to deliver an unforgettable experience.

💰 Support Development:
Enjoying the game? Consider purchasing the Supporter (Gold) Version to help me fully develop False Ages - Dark Lords of Hermad (DLC). The Supporter Version includes the same game but features a unique Main Menu Screen as a token of appreciation for your support. Your contribution directly supports the ongoing development and enhancement of the game.

🔔 Stay Updated:
Love what you see? Follow us for the latest updates and new content at False Ages - Dark Lords of Hermad.

💬 Join the Community:
Have any questions, tips, or feedback? Join the conversation in the comments section!

About False Ages:
False Ages and all its games are based on my very own roleplaying game! Explore a world where every pixel tells a story, combining the nostalgia of classic 8-bit graphics with dark, captivating narratives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Dive into False Ages - Dark Lords of Hermad, an 8-bit Dark Fantasy Turn-Based RPG with 320 x 240 graphics. Uncover secrets, tackle challenging quests, and enjoy an immersive soundtrack. Support development by purchasing the Gold Version with a unique Main Menu Screen!
